articles.title: क्या एलियन सच में हैं? NASA प्रमुख बिल नेल्सन ने दिया सीधा जवाब, एक शब्द में कही अपनी बात
articles.description: Do Aliens Exist: नासा प्रमुख बिल नेल्सन ने एलियन के अस्तित्व पर बड़ा जवाब दिया है। उन्होंने कहा कि हम एलियन के अस्तित्व को नकार नहीं सकते हैं। अंतरिक्ष में करोड़ो ग्रह हैं और इस बात की संभावना है कि अगर कहीं पृथ्वी जैसा माहौल बना होगा तो जिंदगी भी होगी।

articles.title: Britain's new North Ireland trade rules will not break law, minister says
articles.description: When Britain left the EU, Prime Minister Boris Johnson agreed a protocol that effectively left Northern Ireland in the EU's single market and customs union to preserve the open border with Ireland specified in the Good Friday peace agreement.

articles.title: 9 arrested after vicious assault on women in north China
articles.description: Chinese authorities arrested nine people on suspicion of violently assaulting several women at a restaurant after surveillance footage of the attack sparked widespread outrage.

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Crypto extends tumble into weekend after US inflation data
articles.description: Ether declined as much as 5% to $1,445.56, its lowest level since March 2021, while Bitcoin dropped to as low as $27,264.65, its lowest since May 12. Virtually all top tokens tracked by Bloomberg were down Sunday, with the likes of Dogecoin and Avalanche down…
articles.content:
Bitcoin and Ether fell on Sunday amid a broader retreat by the cryptocurrency complex in the wake of data showing US inflation hitting a fresh 40-year high.
Ether declined as much as 5% to $1,445.56… [+1601 chars]

articles.title: We are at home, and will be backing ourselves against Hong Kong: Chhetri
articles.description: Their tails up after two successive wins in front of a strong home crowd, India captain Sunil Chhetri has backed his team to beat Honk Kong in the last qualifying game and secure a berth in next year's AFC Asian Cup.
